title: Jardines de San Juan
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mexican food restaurant in quaint historical mission town of San Juan Bautista. Offers a variety of vegetarian choices on the menu. Will accommodate vegan and gluten free diets upon request. Beans are not made with lard, although rice is cooked with chicken stock as reported to HappyCow. The garden courts and its indoor restaurant can handle large groups as well as individuals and intimate couples.
